Package org.ejbca.core.ejb.approval

Interface ApprovalProfileSession

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ApprovalProfileSessionLocal, ApprovalProfileSessionRemote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApprovalProfileSessionBean
    public interface ApprovalProfileSession
    Session bean to manage approval profiles, i.e. add, remove, find In order to add or edit ApprovalProfiles the admin needs access to: - /ca_functionality/ (StandardRules.CAFUNCTIONALITY) TODO: Generate a separate session beans specifically for performing CRUD operations on ProfileData objects, agnostic of their end purpose. This bean is sufficient for now though.
    Version:
    $Id: ApprovalProfileSession.java 24037 2016-07-27 15:00:00Z anatom $

    • Method Detail

      • addApprovalProfile

        int addApprovalProfile​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                       ApprovalProfile profile)
                throws ApprovalProfileExistsException,
                       AuthorizationDeniedException
        Adds an approval profile to the database.
        Parameters:
        admin - administrator performing the task
        profile - the profile to be added
        Returns:
        the generated approval profile id
        Throws:
        ApprovalProfileExistsException - trying to add a profile with a name or id that already exists
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if current administrator is not authorized to modify profiles

      • changeApprovalProfile

        void changeApprovalProfile​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                           ApprovalProfile profile)
                    throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Updates approval profile data
        Parameters:
        admin - Administrator performing the operation
        profile - profile
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if current administrator is not authorized to modify profiles

      • cloneApprovalProfile

        void cloneApprovalProfile​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                          ApprovalProfile profile,
                          String newname)
                   throws ApprovalProfileExistsException,
                          ApprovalProfileDoesNotExistException,
                          AuthorizationDeniedException
        Adds an approval profile with the same content as the original approval profile.
        Parameters:
        admin - Administrator performing the operation
        profile - name of original approval profile
        newname - name of new approval profile
        Throws:
        ApprovalProfileExistsException - if a profile with newname already exists
        ApprovalProfileDoesNotExistException - if a profile with orgname does not exist
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if current administrator is not authorized to modify profiles

      • getAuthorizedApprovalProfileIds

        List<Integer> getAuthorizedApprovalProfileIds​(AuthenticationToken admin)
        Retrieves a Collection of id:s (Integer) to authorized profiles. Only profiles that the specified administrator is authorized to will be returned.
        Parameters:
        admin - Administrator performing the operation
        Returns:
        List of id:s (Integer)

      • getApprovalProfile

        ApprovalProfile getApprovalProfile​(int id)
        Finds an approval profile by id.
        Parameters:
        id - approval profile id
        Returns:
        Approval profile (cloned) or null if it can not be found.

      • getApprovalProfileName

        String getApprovalProfileName​(int id)
        Returns an approval profile's name given it's id.
        Parameters:
        id - approval profile id
        Returns:
        approval profile name or null if approval profile id does not exist.

      • getApprovalProfileIdToNameMap

        Map<Integer,​String> getApprovalProfileIdToNameMap()
        Method creating a Map mapping profile id (Integer) to profile name (String).
        Returns:
        a Map mapping profile id (Integer) to profile name (String)

      • renameApprovalProfile

        void renameApprovalProfile​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                           ApprovalProfile profile,
                           String newname)
                    throws ApprovalProfileExistsException,
                           ApprovalProfileDoesNotExistException,
                           AuthorizationDeniedException
        Renames an approval profile
        Parameters:
        admin - Administrator performing the operation
        profile - the profile to rename
        newname - the new name of the approval profile
        Throws:
        ApprovalProfileExistsException - if a profile with name newname already exists
        ApprovalProfileDoesNotExistException - if the profile to be renamed hasn't been persisted.
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if current administrator is not authorized to rename profiles

      • removeApprovalProfile

        void removeApprovalProfile​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                           ApprovalProfile profile)
                    throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Removes an approval profile from the database, does not throw any errors if the profile does not exist.
        Parameters:
        admin - Administrator performing the operation
        profile - the approval profile to remove
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if current administrator is not authorized to modify profiles

      • removeApprovalProfile

        void removeApprovalProfile​(AuthenticationToken admin,
                           int id)
                    throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Removes an approval profile from the database, does not throw any errors if the profile does not exist.
        Parameters:
        admin - Administrator performing the operation
        id - the ID of the approval profile to remove
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if current administrator is not authorized to modify profiles

      • forceProfileCacheRebuild

        void forceProfileCacheRebuild()
        Forces the profile cache to rebuild.
